title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Here's an attractive advertising description for the product:

**Travel with Ease: 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR**

Are you tired of worrying about power adapter compatibility when traveling abroad? Look no further! Our 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR is the perfect solution for your international travel needs.

**Convenient and Versatile**

This ultra-light and compact adapter features a 4-in-1 design, accepting standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs. With 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, you can charge multiple devices at once, including your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric products.

**Safe and Reliable**

Our adapter boasts a safe grounded 3 prong plug, ensuring your safety while traveling. It's also CE and FCC certified, providing assurance of its quality and performance.

**Wide Compatibility**

This adapter is designed for use in Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City. It's compatible with devices that support 100V-250V dual voltage, making it perfect for low-power electronics.

**What You Get**

* 3-Pack of Italy Travel Power Adapters
* 4-in-1 design with 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets
* Safe grounded 3 prong plug
* Ultra-light and compact design
* CE and FCC certified
* 12-month warranty
* Friendly customer service

**Order Now and Travel with Confidence!**

Don't let power adapter compatibility issues ruin your trip. Order our 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today and enjoy a hassle-free travel experience!

**Travel with Ease: 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR**

Are you tired of worrying about power outlets when traveling abroad? Look no further! Our 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR is the perfect solution for your power needs while exploring Italy, Chile, Uruguay, and more.

This ultra-light and compact adapter features a grounded 3-prong plug and 2 American outlets, allowing you to charge multiple devices at once. The dual USB ports support up to 2.4A of power, making it ideal for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric products.

With a maximum capacity of 2500W, 250V, and 10A, this adapter is designed to handle all your power needs. It's also certified by CE and FCC, ensuring your safety and peace of mind.

Our adapter is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3-prong flat pin plugs and supports dual voltage devices (100V-250V). Plus, it's backed by a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service.

Don't let power outlets hold you back from experiencing the beauty of Italy and beyond. Order your 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today and travel with confidence!

**Key Features:**

* 3-Pack travel adapter for Italy, Chile, Uruguay, and more
* Grounded 3-prong plug and 2 American outlets
* Dual USB ports with up to 2.4A of power
* Ultra-light and compact design
* CE and FCC certified for safety
* 12-month warranty and friendly customer service
* Compatible with standard N American 2 or 3-prong flat pin plugs
* Supports dual voltage devices (100V-250V)

**Travel Worry-Free with Our 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter!**

Are you planning a trip to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, or other countries that use Type L power sockets? Do you want to stay connected and powered up on the go? Look no further! Our 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter is the perfect solution for all your travel needs.

**Convenient and Versatile**

This 4-in-1 outlet adapter features 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, allowing you to charge multiple devices at once. With a max capacity of 2500W, 250V, and 10A, you can power up your laptop, tablet, smartphone, and other devices with ease.

**Safe and Reliable**

Our adapter is designed with safety in mind. The grounded 3-prong plug ensures a secure connection, and the CE and FCC certifications guarantee a high level of quality and reliability.

**Ultra-Compact and Lightweight**

Weighing in at just 2.8*2.6*2.3 inches, our adapter is the perfect travel companion. Its compact size makes it easy to pack and take with you on all your adventures.

**Wide Voltage Compatibility**

Our adapter is designed to work with devices that support 100V-250V dual voltage, making it perfect for international travel.

**What You Get**

* 3 x Italy Travel Power Adapters
* 4-in-1 outlet adapter with 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets
* Max capacity: 2500W, 250V, 10A
* Grounded 3-prong plug for safe connections
* CE and FCC certified for quality and reliability
* Ultra-compact and lightweight design
* 12-month warranty and friendly customer service

**Order Now and Travel with Confidence!**
